articles.title: GBI releases bodycam video of arrest of woman who fell from moving patrol car and later died
articles.description: The Georgia Bureau of Investigation has released bodycam video of the arrest of a woman who fell out of a Hancock County deputy's patrol car and died several days later as a result of her injuries.
articles.content:
